description:
• Managed daily cash transactions, ensuring accuracy and compliance with company policies.
• Led team in providing exceptional customer service, enhancing client satisfaction and loyalty.
• Developed and implemented effective scheduling plans to optimize team productivity.
• Conducted forecasting and reporting for inventory and sales, aiding strategic decision-making.
• Trained new staff in cash handling procedures and operational standards.

• Troubleshot and repaired computer and printer systems, ensuring optimal functionality.
• Installed and configured various software and hardware components for enhanced performance.
• Provided technical support to clients, resolving issues efficiently and effectively.
• Maintained accurate documentation of repairs and installations to streamline future operations.
• Collaborated with team members to improve service delivery and customer satisfaction.
Assist clients with administrative tasks, email management, scheduling, and data entry while maintaining professionalism and confidentiality.
